title: Front Brake Pads - Inspection

body.body: Check the pad retainer and anti-rattle spring. Renew any component which shows signs of damage or corrosion.
Check that there is no sign of leakage from the caliper piston seals. Rectify any problems before installing the pads.

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: CS8; CR8; CM8; CF7; CE7; CB7; CX7; CT7; CS7; CR7; CN7; CM7; CG7

body.body: Complete the assembly of the brake pads to one caliper (see assembly for details) before removing the pads from the other caliper.
